title: ADDIE Instructional Design and Evaluation for Chemistry MOOC Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic high school chemistry knowledge and understanding of introductory college-level chemistry theories
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining online platform (OpenLearning) with offline practice using digital devices, measuring learning effectiveness through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Systematically develop chemistry MOOC content by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation)
Validate the validity (CVI ≥ 0.9) and reliability (Cronbach's α ≥ 0.9) of e-content and e-assessment modules for chemistry MOOCs
Analyze learners' MOOC perceptions (scoring ≥ 3.5/5) and barriers to usage to propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
